mapper.sql: id,url_id, task_id, url, result, addtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from tb_http_execute where url_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY updatetime DESC LIMIT 1

id,

updatetime,

result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
